record.name: Intial Unit Cost for Purchase Task

rule.condition: same(unit.cost in $L.file, NULL) and category in $L.file="Purchase"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Unit Cost in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Unit Cost">unit.cost</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Unit Cost in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"if (record.part_no==null){\u000a record.unit_cost =0;\u000a}else{ \u000a var producCatalog = lib.StockService.getProductCatalogByPartNo(record.part_no);\u000a if (producCatalog){\u000a record.unit_cost =producCatalog.cost;\u000a record.cost_currency_code =producCatalog.cost_currency_code;\u000a }\u000a}"}

rule.conditionDesc: ( Part No in CurrentRecord != Part No in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Part No">part.no</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Part No">part.no</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Part No in CurrentRecord != Part No in SavedRecord))
